title: The client restores an older patch then tells me to download the new patch AGAIN
body:
i've downloaded the new patch and played like 2 or 3 weeks then today i was opening it then it said something like "the client have restored and older version and will update" and im on a limited network and i cant download it why does it do that!! please help!
im not going to download a 3 GB update again
note: MY INTERNET IS SLOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Ahhhh it sounds like something must have gone wrong when the client was updating to the most recent patch. Your patcher must have noticed some damaged files about, so it's now attempting to repatch to make sure all the game files work properly. 

If it does keep cycling through this 'repatch' you can try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to force a manual repatch by picking **force repatch**.

so basicly i have to redownload the patch...
this took me a full night to download it and now you are telling me to redownload it...
im sorry but sometimes i think ur game is crap
